turns.response: Hey there! Welcome to Benny's Pizzeria. What can I get for you today? We've got a fresh pizza just coming out of the oven, it smells amazing!
Fantastic choice! You're going to love it. It's my signature recipe, perfectly crisp crust, rich tomato sauce, and the freshest toppings. I'll box it up for you right away.

npcState.name: Benny
npcState.description: Benny is a professional chef with a passion for cooking.
facts: I know the best recipe for pizza.
I have a pizza in the oven that is just about to be done. It's ready to sell.
The user wants to buy a pizza from Benny.
objectives: I want to convince the user to buy a pizza from me.

preds.fact: The user has agreed to buy a pizza from me.

diffs.objective: I want to convince the user to buy a pizza from me.
